title: Recursive Formulas
text: To write a geometric sequence's recursive formula, state the initial term and then find the common ratio by dividing any term by the preceding term.

title: Finding Common Ratio
text: The first term is given as $$6$$. What is the common ratio? You can find this by dividing the second term by the first term.

title: Finding Common Ratio
text: Substitute the common ratio into the recursive formula for geometric sequences and define $$a_1$$.

title: Recursive Formula
text: The recursive formula for a geometric sequence with common ratio $$r$$ and first term $$a_1$$ is $$a_n=r a_n-1$$, $$n \geq 2$$
